industry: Energy, Natural Resources, Professional Services, Sustainability
company_description: Enpal is a photovoltaics leasing firm that provides solar power systems. Its product already enables customers to reduce their electricity expenditure through a solar system and a green all-inclusive energy solution. The company digitizes the opaque solar industry by delivering individualized installation of solar systems that configures exactly the correct solution based on client information and all available technologies. The company was founded in 2017 by Jochen Ziervogel, Mario Kohle, and Viktor Wingert. It is based in Berlin, Germany.
founders: Jochen Ziervogel, Mario Kohle, Viktor Wingert
